title: How to Remove Duplicates in Open Office Calc

steps.title: Paste the list that you will want to filter into OOo Calc.
steps.content: Paste the list that you will want to filter into OOo Calc.

steps.title: Select the data that you want to filter.
steps.content: Select the data that you want to filter. After that Go to Data >> Filter >> Standard Filter.

steps.title: Click on More Options.
steps.content: Click on More Options. This will take you to more advanced options.

steps.title: Click on No Duplicates.
steps.content: Click on No Duplicates. Change Field Name to 'none'. If you want to create a separate list, click on Copy To... and select a cell address; such as B1.

steps.title: Select Ok.
steps.content: Select Ok. You will be taken back to your list with the duplicates removed.
